titles: The copy of a letter, sent from two thousand youthfull citizens, to the menacing marshall of the Kings-Bench, Sir John Lenthall.
publisher: March 4. London, Printed by John Raworth,
notes: The letter castigates Lenthall for his actions against "Round-head, and self will'd Seperatists".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
